manifest.name: Update modified date
manifest.description: Automatically update a frontmatter modified date field when you modify your note. This will not use the filesystem time, but only when you modify the file through Obsidian. Optionally store a history of edit times.
manifest.author: Alan Grainger

data.manifestValue: Automatically update a frontmatter modified date field when you modify your note. This will not use the filesystem time, but only when you modify the file through Obsidian. Optionally store a history of edit times.
data.communityListValue: Automatically update a frontmatter modified date field when the file is modified.
